name: @Hack CTF
description_fr:
# CS Games are back!
The largest and most innovative competition for undergraduates in Quebec will take place at <u>ETS</u> in <u>March 2024</u>. Contact your school association to know more about how you can participate.
[More about this year's edition](http://2024.csgames.org)
[More about CS Games in general](https://csgames.org)
